implementations.algorithm

Class AlgorithmImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • implementations.algorithm.AlgorithmImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm

    public class AlgorithmImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements Algorithm
    This class represents the algorithm to solve the scheduling problem. The class is responsible for all DFS searches and maintaining a current best result. The class also acts as a controller for the View to update the visualisation. Algorithm @author: Daniel, Victor, Wayne Visualisation @author: Pulkit
